alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 3:21AM PDT until March 24 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 2000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Del Norte county interior and Northern Humboldt county interior areas including Lord Ellis and Berry summits on Hwy 299 and near the Collier Tunnel on Hwy 199. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior
